attributes.action: Stop Joseph Kony and the Lord's Resistance Army
attributes.additional_details:
The LRA has abducted more than 25,000 children since 1986 and killed more than 15,000 in Uganda.

15,000 half the amount that died during the Libyan civil war and the action taken there was united and strong from many countries, why has so little action been taken?

it needs to stop now, Joseph Kony is not fighting for anything but power, he's not supported by anyone or fighting anyone, only people who oppose him. There is a serious human rights problem here and it is not right.

The government need show support for the arrest of Kony and offer what they can to help.
